mapper.select: select b.*,a.behavior_name as behavior_name,s.name as staff_name,c.name as company_name,s.integral_up as integral_up,s.integral_down as integral_down from behavior_record b inner join behavior_type a on b.bid=a.id inner join staff s on b.sid=s.id inner join company c on b.cid=c.id limit #{page},#{pageSize}

select b.*,a.behavior_name as behavior_name,s.name as staff_name,c.name as company_name from behavior_record b inner join behavior_type a on b.bid=a.id inner join staff s on b.sid=s.id inner join company c on b.cid=c.id WHERE sid=#{sid}
select a.behavior_name as behavior_name,count(*) as statistics from behavior_record b inner join behavior_type a on b.bid=a.id WHERE sid=#{sid} GROUP BY bid
